branches.title: The Necromancer
branches.description: A routine patrol leads you toward something forbidden. Whatever is happening in that alley should not exist.

branches.title: Innocence
branches.description: A quiet night ends in sirens and accusations. Everything you say - or don't - may decide your fate.

branches.title: Oathbound
branches.description: A crown is about to be placed upon a prince's head. You are the only one who hears it protest.

branches.title: Continuance
branches.description: The world has refused to end. You stand among the mechanisms holding it in place.

branches.title: Votes
branches.description: The results are clear. The consequences are not. At dawn, the decision becomes reality.

branches.title: Substitute
branches.description: Your key works. Your life looks right. Something about it feels deeply wrong.

branches.title: Broadcast
branches.description: You have been transmitting into silence for years. Tonight, something answers.

branches.title: Key
branches.description: The artifact has chosen someone again. This time, it chose you.
